entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. I bought a VeloBand Pulse a couple of weeks ago, and it's just not working out for me. I need a refund.
Okay, I can certainly look into that for you. Can I get your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
It's [customer email address]. Hurry up, I don't have all day.

Thank you. Let me pull that up. Okay, I see your order here with the VeloBand Pulse. I do see that it was delivered 15 days ago. Our standard return window is 10 days from the delivery date. Unfortunately, it looks like your request falls outside of that timeframe.
What?! Seriously? 15 days? That's ridiculous! I just opened it last week! I want my money back. This thing is junk!

I understand your frustration, and I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. While a full refund isn't possible due to being outside the return window, let's see what we can do. I'd like to explore the option of offering you store credit for the value of the VeloBand Pulse. This would allow you to choose something else that better suits your needs.
Store credit? Ugh, that's not ideal, but I guess it's better than nothing. Is that really the best you can do? I mean, it's only been a few days over.

I certainly understand. While I cannot make a policy exception for a full refund at this time, the store credit will give you the flexibility to try another product. We have many other fitness trackers and accessories available, and perhaps you could find something you like even better. The VeloBand Pulse just may not have been the right fit for you, and this way you can still get something that will work for you.
Fine, fine. Store credit it is. How does that work?

Great! I can issue a store credit to your account right now. The amount will be for the full purchase price of the VeloBand Pulse, excluding any shipping fees. You'll receive an email with a code you can use at checkout on our website. It will be automatically applied to your account. It's like a gift card, but specifically for VeloFit products. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for...uh...at least doing *something*.
You're very welcome! I'm glad we could find a solution that works for you. I hope you find something you love with your store credit. Have a great day!
Okay, thanks. You too. Actually, thank you for being so patient with me. I was really upset. I appreciate you working with me on this. I'll look forward to finding something else.
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business. Have a great day, and we look forward to seeing you back at VeloFit!
